races.name: Inin
races.description:
Roll d100.
|Roll       |Result             |
|1-2        |Ecthvasin          |
|3-4        |Georothin          |
|5-6        |Kaindorin          |
|7-9        |Jiinin             |
|10-12      |Thairin            |
|13-17      |Grazin             |
|18-22      |Rodonin            |
|23-29      |Bryonin            |
|30-36      |Ganzenonin         |
|37-43      |Rivanonin          |
|44-60      |Melfarionin        |
|61-80      |Letelin            |
|81-100     |Thuilin            |
Inin Features:
Inin stand at about 5-6 ft tall, weighing approximately 120-200 lbs on average.
Inin have standard length pointed ears.
Inin are the most numerous species by far on Adûrun, and thus the most varied in their appearances, cultures, and
demeanors.
Inin typically live 80-120 years.
Inin seemingly have less survival instincts than average, and are oftentimes more warlike, but on the other side of that
coin, are far more spirited and willing to endure hardship.

races.name: Anz
races.description:
Roll d100.
|Roll      |Result            |
|1-70      |West Anzar        |
|71-100    |East Anzar        |
Anz Features:
Anz stand at about 12-15 ft tall, and weigh approximately 600-700 lbs on average.
Anz have long saber-like ears about the length of one’s forearm and white eyes with no irises or pupils
Anz have a naturally low fat content, broad features, coarse woolly black hair, caramel, coffee, or umber brown skin, and
put on muscle faster than the other species.
Anz value tranquility and are stoic in demeanor due to a quickness to anger that plagues them.
Anz live about 60-100 years on average.
Anz are a large creature.

races.name: Cerevu
races.description:
Roll d100.
|Roll      |Result     |
|1-55      |Darii      |
|56-100    |Cerii      |
Cerevu Features:
Cerevu typically stand at about 4-5 ft tall, weighing about 200-300 lbs on average.
Cerevu have rounded ears and are hairier than the other species, but are otherwise androgynous, as the other species are
unsure of how Cerevu reproduce.
Cerevu tend to be rounder and squatter in shape.
Cerevu live around 150-200 years on average.
Cerevu tend to have a very calm and tranquil disposition, and value quiet and industriousness above all else.

races.name: Venii
races.description:
Roll d100.
|Roll      |Result     |
|1-40      |Agunic     |
|41-100    |Unfaic     |
Venii Features:
Venii usually stand at 6-8 ft tall, weighing approximately 120-200 lbs on average.
Venii have jet black smooth chitinous skin, fine stark white hair, and glossy reflective eyes with arachnoid faces and
pedipalps, which they almost always keep veiled or hidden from non-Venii.
Venii have stringy, scrawny, tall, and slender builds, who otherwise seem like Phi’ilin.
Venii typically live 150-200 years on average.
Venii maintains an attempted pleasant attitude but suffers from a terribly awkward disposition.

subraces.name: Ecthvasin
subraces.description: Wavy bright red hair, bright green eyes, pale skin.

subraces.name: Georothin
subraces.description: Black hair, green eyes, pale skin.

subraces.name: Kaindorin
subraces.description: Thick black hair, brown eyes, taller than average, olive skin.

subraces.name: Jiinin
subraces.description: Fine black hair, almond-shaped brown eyes, less hairy than average, shorter and thinner on average, pale or olive skin

subraces.name: Thairin
subraces.description: Black curly hair, shorter and hairier than average, dark brown eyes, olive skin

subraces.name: Grazin
subraces.description: Fine blonde hair, broader and taller than average, blue eyes, pale skin

subraces.name: Rodonin
subraces.description: Dark stringy greenish-black hair, smooth and round facial features, almond-shaped dark green eyes, olive skin

subraces.name: Bryonin
subraces.description: Black hair, red eyes, pale skin

subraces.name: Ganzenonin
subraces.description: Fine black hair, blue eyes, pale skin

subraces.name: Rivanonin
subraces.description: Pale brown hair, pale brown eyes, pale skin

subraces.name: Melfarionin
subraces.description: Dirty blonde hair, bright golden eyes, pale or bronze skin

subraces.name: Letelin
subraces.description: Thick dark brown hair, dark brown eyes, pale skin

subraces.name: Thuilin
subraces.description: Black hair, bright silver-rimmed irises in eyes, pale skin

subraces.name: Freinin
subraces.description:
Freinin usually stand at about half an Inin’s height, weighing approximately a quarter as much on average as well.
Freinin come in all shapes and sizes, but are considered small creatures.
Freinin have a variety of skin, hair, and eye colors.
Freinin typically live 60-80 years on average.
Freinin, called “humans” or “mankind” in their own tongues and native to Adûrun, maintain a variety of demeanors, but
generally speaking, tend to be characterized as frail and craven, or at least, quite risk-averse compared to the other
species.
Freinin cannot use Dakar or Psionics, including Links.
Freinin does not have any subspecies.

feats.name: Accurate Strikes
feats.description: Carefully measured blows improve martial prowess.

feats.name: Hardened Body
feats.description: Scar tissue and calloused skin make you tougher.

items.name: Iron Ring
items.description: A simple iron ring that grounds your stance.

items.name: Scholar's Journal
items.description: Reference notes that inspire deft thinking.

statusEffects.name: Blessed
statusEffects.description: A calm blessing steadies your hand.

derivedStats.name: Defense
derivedStats.description: Represents how difficult you are to harm when alert.

derivedStats.name: Martial Bonus
derivedStats.description: Your martial prowess and any training bonuses.
